content: I am currently an undergraduate researcher in the Scalable Statistical Machine Learning (S2ML) lab at UC Santa Barbara. Prior to my research in machine learning, I was fortunate to work directly with National Academy of Sciences Member Joe Incandela on the Light Dark Matter eXpimeriment (LDMX). I also spent a summer doing data analysis for the Compact Muon Solenoid (CMS) experiment.

title: Gavin Niendorf
